TaxDisclosureSummary.name: TaxDisclosureSummary
TaxDisclosureSummary.description: Represents statistics about the disclosure of business entity information to all tax jurisdictions.

CustomerTaxCollected.description: The total tax collected from customers on behalf of a tax authority.

Description.description: The description of the tax disclosure statistics.

DisclosedBy.description: The name of the business entity disclosing the tax details. A business entity can be an individual or an organization.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the tax disclosure statistics are generated.

EmployeeCount.description: The total number of employees within the tax jurisdiction.

EmployeeTaxWithheld.description: The total tax withheld and paid on behalf of employees.

EmployeeTotalIncome.description: The total income of the employee, which includes salaries, bonuses, commissions, retirement savings contributions, and other financial benefits.

IncomeTaxAccrued.description: The income tax accrued by an individual or organization within the tax jurisdiction.

IncomeTaxPaid.description: The income tax paid by an individual or organization within the tax jurisdiction.

IndustryTaxDue.description: The total industry taxes or payments due to governments.

IntraCompanyDebt.description: The total intra-company debt held by a business entity in the tax jurisdiction.

IntraGroupTrxnRev.description: The revenue from intra-group transactions within the tax jurisdiction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PrimaryActivity.description: The primary activity of the business entity for which the tax disclosure is being done.

ProfitLossBeforeTax.description: The profit or loss before tax within the tax jurisdiction. Enter a positive value that indicates profit before tax or negative value that indicates loss before tax.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.

TangibleAssetValue.description: The value of the tangible assets within the tax jurisdiction.

TaxJurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction of the tax disclosure.

ThirdPartySalesRevenue.description: The revenue from third-party sales within the tax jurisdiction.

UncertainTaxPositionVal.description: The total uncertain tax position value.
